data.name: SlimeTime
data.detailed_description:
SlimeTime is a Single or Multi-player experience like many others.
At least for now...

Multiplayer Mode: CUMMIES [2-4 players] (8 PLAYERS SUPPORT IS COMING!!)
) ) ============================================================D

In our first multiplayer mode (CUMMIES) you have to Slime or be Slimed!
One Human will be transformed into SexCrimer at the start of the round.
Whomever avoids being the SexCrimer longest, is the winner!

Humans will need to run, hide or be slimed! Use pickups scattered around the
map to slow down SexCrimer or for increased Stamina to 'outrun the cum'.

Multiplayer Mode: ESCAPE [2-4 players ]
) ) ============================================================D

Humans will try their best to escape by finding items; randomly scattered
throughout each level. One Human will be transformed into SexCrimer at the
start of the round.

As a Human:
In order to escape your eventual creaming, Humans must find 5 items.
These items will help you break though/remove what is blocking the exit.
Humans can work together or use each other as bait! Humans need to escape
before the time is up or SexCrimer takes their souls.

As the SexCrimer:
If you prefer to win it as the green spew machine, your goal will be to
stop the Humans from escaping! Slow their escape; by Sliming them, it will force
the Human to drop the item they are holding (it will then disappear).
Beat the clock to beat the Humans.

) ) ============================================================D

Short Term Updates:
-Implement Stamina Systems for Human/SexCrimer (85 % Complete, Human
Stamina implemented (with Stamina pickup) SexCrimer has unlimited sprint v0.4)
-Setup Item Spawn system (random locations)
-Escape system with random exit locations. (50 % Complete, Exits
Implemented v0.2)
-New Map (The Facility, yes - that one) RELEASED (v0.4)
-First Person RELEASED (v0.4)

Long Term Goals:
-Splat Racing mode
-Single Player Survival Mode (partially complete)
-Co-op Survival mode

) ) ============================================================D

**NOTE**

If you are expecting cutting edge graphics and innovative gameplay; please look
somewhere else!

Full disclosure; ST was born from a meme and has become a vehicle for our game
development. But rest assured, this is no flasher in the park-pan (what?). We plan
on implementing a ton of features (as we learn how they work!).

Our (currently open!) playtest will serve as our testing and development stage prior
to launching the game.

Multiplayer modes are the focus at the moment, but a Single player (Survival Mode)
has already been developed. This mode will require a few tweaks before we bring it
back into the beta.

We are totally open to suggestions and feedback - please feel free to send us messages
via our Discord Server, Reddit, Twitter or Youtube videos.

CONTACT US!! WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!!
-----------------------------------------------------
Join our discord! : https://discord.gg/uvfvWV86rX
Our check out our reddit : https://www.reddit.com/user/KummiStudios
Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/kummistudios
Watch us on YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpRaYkivMvV7PWTELEGaR8A

www.kummistudios.com
kummistudios@gmail.com

Slime On!
-Greybush & the KS dev. team

data.short_description: Ever want to know what it's like to be Slimed? Yeah, neither did we - but we do now. Take a splat solo or with your best friends (or maybe make new ones?) through custom (and familiar) levels. Locations ranging from 'Slimy Sewers' to the sun drenched sands of 'the Island'. Slime or be Slimed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low Quality - 1080x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High Quality - 2K

content_descriptors.notes: Please note there is no human nudity/explicit content. There's actually only one character 'SexCrimer' whose "man-like" parts will be visible (and they are not detailed, looks like a green coke can). This is not a game you play with one hand (well maybe, I don't know what you are into). The only sexual act depicted here is a simulated "ejaculation" to pass the Tag from players. Currently there is no 'gore' but we do have plans on a death animation - imagine the cover of 'Load'..
